mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pwd, name, nick, birth, tel, gender, createddate, post, addr, subaddr, interest, intro, thumbnail) values(#{id}, sha2(#{password},256), #{name}, #{nick}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{gender}, now(), #{post}, #{address}, #{subAddr}, #{interest}, #{intro}, 'jj.png')
mapper.select: select mno, name, id, nick, intro, thumbnail, createddate from member where mno=#{value}
select mno, name, id from member order by mno
select mno, name, id, createddate from member where id=#{id} and pwd=sha2(#{password},256) and outstate=0
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, id=#{id}, nick=#{nick}, pwd=sha2(#{password},256) where mno=#{no}
mapper.select: select mno, nick, intro, thumbnail from member order by rand() Limit 20
select mno, id, nick, birth, gender, interest, intro, thumbnail from member where mno=#{mno}
select mno, id, nick, addr, birth, gender, interest, intro, thumbnail from member where nick=#{nick}
select mno, name, id, addr from member order by mno limit 10;
select mno, name, id, addr from member order by mno desc limit 10;
select mno, id, name, nick, birth, tel, gender, createddate, addr, subaddr, interest, outstate, outdate from member where mno=#{value};

select mno, name, id from member
where name like concat("%", #{keyword}, "%") or id like concat("%", #{keyword}, "%")
order by mno
select count(*) from member where mno=#{no} and pwd=sha2(#{password},256);
mapper.update: update member set outstate = true, outdate = now() where mno=#{value};
